mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM (SELECT sa.SPL_APPR_ID , sa.SPL_APPR_TYPE , sa.SPL_ID , sa.SPL_NAME , sa.SPL_CTGR , sa.INV_QTY , sa.SPL_APPR_REQTR , sa.DEL_YN , sa.SPL_APPR_YN , a.APPR_DATE , e.EMP_NAME , e.EMAIL FROM SUPPLY_APPROVAL sa JOIN APPROVAL a ON a.APPR_INFO = sa.SPL_APPR_ID JOIN EMPLOYEE e ON e.EMP_ID = sa.SPL_APPR_REQTR) WHERE DEL_YN = 'N'

SELECT SPL_APPR_ID , SPL_APPR_TYPE , SPL_ID , SPL_NAME , SPL_CTGR , INV_QTY , SPL_APPR_REQTR , DEL_YN , SPL_APPR_YN , TO_CHAR(APPR_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') APPR_DATE , EMP_NAME , EMAIL FROM (SELECT sa.SPL_APPR_ID , sa.SPL_APPR_TYPE , sa.SPL_ID , sa.SPL_NAME , sa.SPL_CTGR , sa.INV_QTY , sa.SPL_APPR_REQTR , sa.DEL_YN , sa.SPL_APPR_YN , a.APPR_DATE , e.EMP_NAME , e.EMAIL FROM SUPPLY_APPROVAL sa JOIN APPROVAL a ON a.APPR_INFO = sa.SPL_APPR_ID JOIN EMPLOYEE e ON e.EMP_ID = sa.SPL_APPR_REQTR) WHERE DEL_YN = 'N'
